bibl.title: Despatch from R. Dorsey Mohun to William F. Wharton, January 27, 1892
Despatches from United States Consuls in Boma, 1888-1895
bibl.publisher: National Archives and Records Service General Services Administration

div1.p:
Commercial Agency, U.S.A.
Boma, Congo Free State Jany 27th, 18892
(now at #1609 35th st. Washington, D.C.
div1.ab:
Honorable William F. Wharton
Assistant Secretary of State,
Washington, D.C.
div1.p: I have the honor to acknowledge the receipt of your despatch No. 1 dated January 22d, and beg to say that I accept the appointment as Commercial Agent of the United States at Boma in the Congo Free State.
I enclose herewith Bond and Oath of Office duly executed.

I am, Sir
Very respectfully
R. Dorsey Mohun
Commercial Agent
Congo Free State

P.S. I was was born in the District of Columbia and was appointed from the same place.
R. Dorsey Mohun
